data.title: Manappuram Finance Limited
data.meta_description: Gold Loan - Manappuram Finance Ltd is a Kerela based NBFC (Non Banking Financial Comapany) which provides Online Gold Loan at 1%* Interest Rate, No Hidden Charges and Minimum Documentation
data.text:
ONLINE GOLD LOAN

With our new online gold loan facility, you can avail gold loan 24x7, from anywhere in the world!

Gold loan in 3 easy steps

Quick and simple

Instant loan Disbursement

Minimum Documentation

Security and safety of Gold deposits

Why Choose Us

No extra processing charges

We do not charge any extra hidden processing fees.

Maximum loan amount per gram

The gold loan rate per gram offered by Manappuram is the highest in this segment.

Day wise interest

We let users know of the day-wise interest rates

Wide range of schemes

Manappuram offers a wide range of schemes to cater to the varied needs and financial goals of different users

Less documentation for loans

A straightforward process doesn’t require any in-depth knowledge. The debtor has to carry the gold to be mortgaged and identity/ address proof.

Instant loan. No bureau check

Why wait endlessly for gold loan approval? Save your time! Get instant disbursal of the loan amount with Manappuram.

Our Special Offerings

In 2007, it became the first Kerala based NBFC to receive investment from foreign institutional investors (FIIs) when the celebrated PE fund, Sequoia Capital, invested Rs.700 million along with Hudson Equity Holdings.
